headline: Vulcan Materials (NYSE:VMC) Declares US$0.49 Quarterly Dividend Payout
summary: Vulcan Materials (NYSE:VMC) recently affirmed a quarterly cash dividend of $0.49 per share, reinforcing its dedication to shareholder value. During the past month, Vulcan experienced a 13% price increase, outperforming the flat market. This movement aligns with positive indicators, such as strong quarterly earnings that reported an increase in sales and net income. The announcement of substantial corporate guidance and ongoing share repurchases further amplified investor confidence. These...
